install.copyright: Copyright (C) 2005 - 2012 Open Source Matters. All rights reserved.
install.license: This extension is released under the GNU/GPL License
install.description: JoomlaXi Registration Redirector should be used to redirect registration requests from the joomla core system to Jom Social. To setup a menu which links to user profile, use a link to profile without user id.

param.name: redirectto
param.label: Route or Redirect all registrations to
param.description: Registration redirection from any registration to selected form the list.

param.name: customUrl
param.description: Registration redirection to this URL when custom URL is selected

param.name: needLangCode
param.label: Use Multiple Language
param.description: If your site use multiple language then set this option to yes, and use the langauge code in next option.

param.name: LangCode
param.label: Language Code
param.description: If your site use multiple language then set the langauge here. This will add language into URL
